testsuite.name: com.media3watch.SessionIngestionTest

testcase.name: test session is persisted to database()
test multiple sessions are persisted independently()
test invalid session is rejected and not persisted()

failure.message: org.opentest4j.AssertionFailedError: Invalid session should not be persisted ==> expected: <0> but was: <12>
